resp = client.ingest.simulate(
    pipeline={
        "description": "Hide my IP",
        "processors": [
            {
                "redact": {
                    "field": "message",
                    "patterns": [
                        "%{IP:client}"
                    ]
                }
            }
        ]
    },
    docs=[
        {
            "_source": {
                "message": "55.3.244.1 GET /index.html 15824 0.043"
            }
        }
    ],
)
print(resp)
